p: Mean BGL of all groups was not significantly different from each other at zero and thirty minutes after glucose feeding ( Table 3). Peak blood glucose level was measured after thirty minutes. Blood glucose reduction was significant ( p < 0.001) at 1 and 2 hours with 400 and 600 mg/kg of the leaf latex compared to the vehicle. Blood glucose reduction at 200 mg/kg dose of the latex was delayed and found to be significant ( p < 0.01) after 2 hours.
